mapper.select: select challenge.chnum, chname, chdonate, chdesc, chimg, chsuccess, chexp, chmaxp, chsdate, chedate, count(checknum) as checknum, donatepay, donateco from donabit.challenge left join donabit.checks on challenge.chnum = checks.chnum group by challenge.chnum

select challenge.chnum, count(challenging.nickname) as nickname, challenging.chnum as chnum2, personalpf from donabit.challenge left join donabit.challenging on challenge.chnum = challenging.chnum GROUP BY challenge.chnum;
SELECT count(*) FROM donabit.challenging where challenging.nickname in (#{nickname}) and challenging.chnum like #{chnumdetail};
SELECT checks.nickname, checkid, checktitle, checkdesc, checkimg AS checkimg2, checktime, member.avatar FROM checks JOIN member on checks.nickname = member.nickname ORDER BY checktime DESC

select checks.nickname, chnum, checknum, checktime, checktitle, checkdesc, checkimg, checks.checkid, count(likes) as totallikes, member.avatar from checks left outer join toggle on checks.checkid = toggle.checkid left outer join member on checks.nickname = member.nickname group by checkid order by totallikes desc;
select count(chnum) from challenging where nickname = #{nickname};

SELECT challenging.nickname, challenging.chnum, challenge.chmaxp, (select count(challenging.chnum) from donabit.challenging where challenging.chnum like #{chnumajax} GROUP BY challenging.chnum)as nickname2 FROM donabit.challenging join donabit.challenge on challenge.chnum = challenging.chnum WHERE challenging.nickname LIKE #{nickname} and challenging.chnum LIKE #{chnumajax};

SELECT challenge.chnum, challenge.chmaxp, (select count(challenging.chnum) from donabit.challenging where challenging.chnum like #{chnumajax} GROUP BY challenging.chnum)as nickname2 FROM donabit.challenge left join donabit.challenging on challenge.chnum = challenging.chnum WHERE challenge.chnum LIKE #{chnumajax} GROUP BY challenge.chnum;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenging(nickname, chnum, personalpf) VALUES(#{nickname}, #{chnumajax}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM donabit.toggle where likes like #{nickname} and checkid like #{checkid};
SELECT count(*) FROM donabit.toggle where report like #{nickname} and checkid like #{checkid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO toggle(likes, checkid, toggletime) VALUES(#{nickname}, #{checkid}, now());
INSERT INTO toggle(report, checkid, toggletime) VALUES(#{nickname}, #{checkid}, now());
mapper.select: select count(*) from donabit.toggle where checkid like #{checkid} and likes is null;

select checks.chnum, count(checks.chnum) as 'count', challenge.chsuccess, challenge.chname from donabit.checks join donabit.challenge on challenge.chnum = checks.chnum where checks.nickname like #{nickname} GROUP BY checks.chnum;
SELECT checkid, MAX(toggletime) AS toggletime, COUNT(report) AS report FROM toggle GROUP BY checkid;
